# allowsMultipleSelection

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the user can select multiple items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the browser allows the user to select multiple items at once.

## Managing Selection Behavior

- **allowsBranchSelection**: A Boolean that indicates whether the user can select branch items.
- **allowsEmptySelection**: A Boolean that indicates whether there can be nothing selected.
- **selectedRowIndexes(inColumn:)**: Provides the indexes of the selected rows in a given column of the browser.
- **selectRowIndexes(_:inColumn:)**: Specifies the selected rows in a given column of the browser.
- **allowsTypeSelect**: A Boolean that indicates whether the browser allows keystroke-based selection (type select).
